Camera identifier. Valid characters are lowercase a-z, numbers and underscores.

value.name: detection_label
value.description: Label(s) of the object(s) to send notifications for (comma-separated for multiple labels, e.g., 'person,cat').

value.name: send_thumbnail
value.description: Send a thumbnail of the detected object.

value.name: use_public_url
value.description: Use public URL for images instead of base64 encoding. This creates a temporary public link that doesn't require authentication.

value.name: image_max_size
value.description: Maximum width/height in pixels for thumbnail images (default: 800). For 4K cameras, use 1920 or higher. Set to 0 for no resizing.

value.name: image_quality
value.description: JPEG quality for images (1-100, default: 95). Higher = better quality but larger files.
